title: As electricity costs rise, everyone wants data centers to pick up their tab. But how?

title: SGPC holds meeting of experts to discuss AI use in spreading misinformation about Sikhism
description: AMRITSAR, Feb 13: The Shiromani Gurdwara Parbandhak Committee on Friday held a meeting of a sub-committee comprising technical experts here to discuss the issue of the misinformation about Sikh faith circulated using AI tools. The sub-committee has been constituted by the president of the Shiromani Gurdwara Parbandhak Committee (SGPC). The sub-committee has been formed to curb the growing trend of spreading misinformation about ‘Sikhi’ through Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology and to prevent the circulation of content on social media that […]
content:
AMRITSAR, Feb 13: The Shiromani Gurdwara Parbandhak Committee on Friday held a meeting of a sub-committee comprising technical experts here to discuss the issue of the misinformation about Sikh faith circulated using AI tools.

title: Radio’s Relevance in the Time of Artificial Intelligence
description: Biju Dharmapalan Radio has always carried a certain charm — intimate yet expansive, simple yet powerful. It slips quietly into daily life, asking for little but offering companionship, information and a sense of belonging. Long before screens dominated attention, radio was the trusted voice in the room — connecting distant geographies, diverse languages and countless lives through shared listening. Even in today’s hyper-digital world, radio retains a rare quality: it listens as much as it speaks. Many historical moments are […]
content:

title: Sci-fi film 'Good Luck, Have Fun, Don't Die' warns of AI, with a comic twist
description: Gore Verbinski hopes his film "Good Luck, Have Fun, Don't Die" will be therapeutic, while also cautioning against the deteriorating effect of technology and artificial intelligence on society, the Oscar-winning director said at the Berlin Film Festival on Friday.

title: AI is moving beyond IT into physical operations, says Anant Maheshwari
description: Artificial intelligence is now enhancing physical operations, moving beyond IT. This 'physical AI' allows systems to learn and create new rules, impacting factories, buildings, and infrastructure globally. Honeywell sees this as an opportunity to accelerate talent development, addressing global shortages. India is highlighted as a key innovation hub, with its local model influencing multinational strategies worldwide.

title: Maharashtra's $5 trillion ambition: Scaling manufacturing and services
description: Maharashtra is embracing artificial intelligence, seeing it as a tool to boost human skills. The state is enhancing its infrastructure and policies to attract global investment. Maharashtra aims to become a trillion-dollar economy by 2030 and a five-trillion-dollar economy by 2047. The focus is on integrating manufacturing and services for inclusive growth across all districts.
